description: Added `/auto` command, to regularly send games in a channel (thanks to INotSleep). Also fixed a long-standing bug with some squares being missing in large games. Sadly I had to reduce the max game width to 24.
Added slash commands! Note: starting April 2022, Discord forces you to use them instead of text commands.
There is now also an option to start games without having the first region uncovered. Plus some minor fixes.
When you create a game, I will now automatically uncover the first region for you.

Added `!minesweeperraw`/`!msraw`. It's the same as the normal minesweeper commands, but it gives you the raw text/copypasta of the game, so you can share it with others. There's also a new `!setprefix` command to change the `!` prefix to something else. Furthermore, the response speed and uptime of the bot have been vastly improved.
Removed unkown command message and added `!ping` command.
Improved error messages and added `!news` command.
Fixed issue where I sometimes didn't reply when you requested large games.
